description.ko: 완벽한 질서가 디지털 혼돈을 만나 흑백의 공허를 산산조각 내는 순간입니다.
description.en: The moment where perfect order meets digital chaos, shattering the monochrome void.

prompt: A monolith of pure obsidian being violently fractured by a digital glitch, sharp geometric shards hovering in mid-air amidst layers of monochrome scanlines and static noise. Sharp angles create a complex play of shadows. 8k, hyper-realistic, monochrome palette using #1A1A1A and #FFFFFF, high-contrast lighting, Octane Render, ray-traced reflections on the fragmented surfaces, ultra-detailed digital artifacts, and chaotic order.
